{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Sprint_Overdrive_Pro_3G/4G_Mobile_Hotspot |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Sprint |model = Overdrive |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Pro 3G/4G Mobile Hotspot |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = mobile hotspot, 3G mobile router, WiMAX modem, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = N7N-MHS802 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP300; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 624<!-- 208 / 624 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5 IT; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5 IT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 84:DB:2F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = BAT |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_bat = |pwr_bat_amp = |pwr_bat_type = |pwr_bat_mAh = |pwr_bat_cells = |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 4G (WiMAX), 3G (CMDA), MicroSD Card slot, battery, screen, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = OverdriveProXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^OverdrivePro[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Sierra Wireless |manuf_model = AirCard W802S |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/01/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8786; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (USB) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM6085; |rad2chip2 = Beceem;BCSM350; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2stand = CDMA/WiMAX
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "SIERRA WIRELESS", "1400493. REV B", and "MADE IN TAIWAN" :is on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC internal photos show the device with the following... *[[Marvell]] 88AP300-BGK2 SoC @624MHz [http://www.marvell.com/guide/assets/data/marvell_psg.pdf DS] [http://avnetexpress.avnet.com/store/em/EMController?term=88AP300&x=15&y=11&action=products&langId=-1&storeId=500201&catalogId=500201&hbxSType=&N=0&filterButton=true BD] *[[Marvell]] 88W8786-NAP2 - 802.11b/g Chip *[[Qualcomm]] MDM6085 - CDMA 3G Radio *[[Beceem]] BCSM350 - WiMAX (4G) Chip *''Micron'' MT29C2G24M - LPDRAM/Flash (NAND) 128/256MB [http://www.digchip.com/datasheets/parts/datasheet/301/MT29C2G24MAAAAHAML-5_IT.php DS] *[[Samsung]] K521H57ACM-A060
Units contributing to this entry are below... :WiFi OUI: 84:DB:2F, WiMAX OUI: 00:A0:D5
The default SSID pattern for these devices appears to be :'''OverdriveProXXX''' (where '''XXX''' is the last three :hex digits [upper case letters] of the AP's BSSID)
==Links of Interest== :[http://support.sprint.com/global/pdf/user_guides/sierra_wireless/overdrive_pro/overdrive_pro_by_sierra_wireless_ug.pdf User Guide]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2385937,00.asp Review on '''PCmag'''] :''[[Virgin Mobile]]'' also provides this device :(with their branding) for their service.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
